009package Ch10_FittingLines;
010
011import ij.IJ;
012import ij.ImagePlus;
013import ij.gui.Overlay;
014import ij.gui.Roi;
015import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
016import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
017import imagingbook.common.color.sets.BasicAwtColor;
018import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
019import imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.line.LineFit;
020import imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.line.LinearRegressionFit;
021import imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.line.OrthogonalLineFitEigen;
022import imagingbook.common.geometry.line.AlgebraicLine;
023import imagingbook.common.hough.HoughLine;
024import imagingbook.common.ij.RoiUtils;
025import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ColoredStroke;
026import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ShapeOverlayAdapter;
027
028
029/**
030 * <p>
031 * Performs line fitting on the point set specified by the current ROI. Two
032 * fitting methods are employed: (a) linear regression fitting, (b) orthogonal
033 * regression fitting. The result of the first varies with rotation, while
034 * orthogonal fitting is rotation-invariant. See Sec. 10.2 (Fig. 10.4) of [1]
035 * for additional details.
036 * </p>
037 * <p>
038 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An Algorithmic
039 * Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer (2022).
040 * </p>
041 * 
042 * @author WB
043 * @version 2022/09/30
044 * @see Sample_Line_To_Roi
045 */
046public class Fit_Line_From_Roi implements PlugInFilter { // TODO: activate dialog
047        
048        public boolean ShowLog = true;
049        public static BasicAwtColor RegressionFitColor = BasicAwtColor.Red;
050        public static BasicAwtColor OrthogonalFitColor = BasicAwtColor.Blue;
051        public static double StrokeWidth = 0.5;
052        
053        private ImagePlus im;
054        
055        @Override
056        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) {
057                this.im = im;
058                return DOES_ALL + ROI_REQUIRED;
059        }
060
061        @Override
062        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
063                Roi roi = im.getRoi();
064                int width = ip.getWidth();
065                int height = ip.getHeight();
066                
067                if (!runDialog()) {
068                        return;
069                }
070                
071                Pnt2d[] points = RoiUtils.getOutlinePointsFloat(roi);
072                IJ.log("Found points " + points.length);
073                if (points.length < 2) {
074                        IJ.error("At least 2 points are required, but found only " + points.length);
075                        return;
076                }
077                
078                Overlay oly = im.getOverlay();
079                if (oly == null) {
080                        oly = new Overlay();
081                        im.setOverlay(oly);
082                }
083                
084                ShapeOverlayAdapter ola = new ShapeOverlayAdapter(oly);
085                
086                // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
087                LineFit fitO = new OrthogonalLineFitEigen(points);
088                AlgebraicLine lineO = fitO.getLine();
089                // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
090                
091                if (lineO == null) {
092                        IJ.log("Orthogonal line fit failed!");
093                        return;
094                }
095                
096                if (ShowLog) {
097                        IJ.log("Orthogonal line fit: " + lineO.toString());
098                }
099                
100                ColoredStroke orthogonalStroke = new ColoredStroke(StrokeWidth, OrthogonalFitColor.getColor());
101                ola.addShape(new HoughLine(lineO).getShape(width, height), orthogonalStroke);
102
103                // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
104                LineFit fitR = new LinearRegressionFit(points);
105                AlgebraicLine lineR = fitR.getLine();
106                // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
107                
108                if (lineR == null) {
109                        IJ.log("Regression fit failed!");
110                        return;
111                }
112                
113                if (ShowLog) {
114                        IJ.log("Regression line fit: " + lineR.toString());
115                }
116
117                ColoredStroke regressionStroke = new ColoredStroke(StrokeWidth, RegressionFitColor.getColor());
118                ola.addShape(new HoughLine(lineR).getShape(width, height), regressionStroke);
119
120        }
121
122        // ------------------------------------------
123        
124        private boolean runDialog() {
125//              GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
126                return true;
127        }
128
129}
